item.title: Bearcat EV Tasklist
item.description: This file is the TODO list for the Bearcat EV software team, and all I/O document. State machine The state machine model needs to be a Moore machine, i.e. the control strategy only depends on the current state, not the inputs. Inputs only trigger the transition from one state to another. State list and transition condition Except all \*_WAIT state and ERROR state, at each state, a watchdog timer must be created at the beginning, to prevent any dead loop error.

item.title: Failure and plan b - 2nd Dev Journal
item.description: This is the second developper journal of my project, using a Raspberry Pi 4B to control an electric wheelchair. This project is partly funded by the IRAS lab at University of Cincinnati and by my own pocket. The project can be found at my GitHub repository raspi-powerchair. The first post can be found at xiahualiu.github.io.
